topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5581f3126368721109004bf8#post_5581f3126368721109004bf8
You should read Anita's twitter right now.  Short version: you know how she keeps claiming to not be Jack Thompson 2.0?  Well she's gone fullblown 100% Jack Thompson to the point AAA studios are coming out against them.

It's hilarious cause what is essentially happening:
Anita, "I'm not Jack Thompson!"
Devs, "Here's our support"
Anita, "All violence in games should be banned!"
AAA companies, "Fuck that!"

The reason why I'm laughing my ass off is that feminists have realized they've been worshiping the Jack Thompson 2.0 and they're trying to run away from the monster they've created as fast as possible by trying to rebrand themselves as fast as possible but the weight of the monster they've created is impossible to escape.


Tl:dr of current drama shit going on in the internet; Jack Thompson 2.0 comes out of the metaphorical closet and admits she's just trying to get rid of violence in games -> her supporters are going "OH SHIT!  We've created Jack Thompson 2.0! RUN! QUICK CHANGE OUR NAME!  DO SOMETHING!  ANYTHING!"


I'm laughing cause it's legitimately hilarious, it's not even the cringe kind of hilarity either.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5581f6af6368721323003684#post_5581f6af6368721323003684

topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5581f6af6368721323003684#post_5581f6af6368721323003684
*ANY* violence is too violent for her; why she's Jack Thompson 2.0

For once with all this drama shit the past year it's gone back into legitimately hilarious mode.  You know how all that drama for the longest time was the cringe type of funny; I'm actually unironically smiling from this drama and not from cringe either, but cause watching all the people on tumblr and twitter going "OH FUCK! We've created Jack Thompson 2.0!" is actually funny.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5581fc0a63687206d200006d#post_5581fc0a63687206d200006d
You missed the E3 thing.  She's now rallying against all forms of violence, not sexism.

Reason why I'm legitimately laughing at this:
She scammed all of the feminist movement into supporting her so she could become Jack Thompson #2.

The opposition to her tried to warn them for years she was a con artist and it turns out she was just using feminism to make herself a name to revive the Jack Thompson movement in her name.
